title: Bulletin of the International Association of Medical Museums
additional-note: There were two series of the Bulletin of the International Association of Medical Museums. The first ran from 1907 to 1925 and is now all public domain.  The second (separated from the first by the Journal of Technical Methods and Bulletin of the International Association of Medical Museums) ran from 1947 to 1951, and has no active copyright renewal records we are aware of.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
